metadata.Title: CVE-2015-9275 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
ARC 5.21q allows directory traversal via a full pathname in an archive file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2015-9275` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

arc - 5.21q-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: arc package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.21q-6').
